doc.field: ESSO RAISES SINGAPORE PETROL PUMP PRICES

Esso Singapore Pte Ltd said it raised pump prices of petrol from today. New prices for 0.15 gm lead grades are 97.0 cents/litre for 97 octane and 90.8 cents for 95 octane. Other Singapore oil companies announced yesterday that they would revise their pump prices effective today. Shell Eastern Petroleum Pte Ltd, Mobil Oil Singapore Pte Ltd, Caltex Asia Ltd, Singapore Petroleum Co Pte Ltd and BP Singapore Pte Ltd are pricing 97 octane at 96.8 cents. Shell, Mobil and Caltex are pricing 92 octane at 90.2 cents, and SPC and BP at 90.6 cents. REUTER
